name: SlimeTrail
description:
Important! On opening the game click the game window to focus or controls won't work

Venture forth into the world of slime trail as you a humble slime cross through mysterious floating islands while harnessing the powers granted to you from strange statues. Careful though as a single wrong step could send you to your grave.

This game was created for the Retrograde game jam by Riley Page who did the programming and BlobbingPixels who did the game art. Using the limitations of limited controls you have to use only a dpad (actually WASD) as well as A and B (actually O and P) to control your gelatinous self as you journey through these strange puzzles.
